# Add Messages to Your Request

If you created a request through the platform and wish to add a message to your interaction with the vendor or SoftwareOne, you can do this through the **Add Message** option on the request details page.

When adding a new message, note the following points:

* The new message you add to the conversation will be visible to all members of your account. &#x20;
* You can add a message regardless of the request's status.

## Adding a message to a request

Follow these steps to add a new message:&#x20;

1. On the **Requests** page (**Marketplace** > **Requests**), select the required request. The request details page is displayed.
2. On the **Activity** tab, click **Add message**. The Add message dialog box is displayed.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (982).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Add message option on the Activity tab</p></figcaption></figure>

3. Type your message and then click **Add**. You can format the text, and add links, and insert images by clicking <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="<svg xmlns=&#x22;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#x22; height=&#x22;24px&#x22; viewBox=&#x22;0 -960 960 960&#x22; width=&#x22;24px&#x22; fill=&#x22;#5f6368&#x22;><path d=&#x22;M200-120q-33 0-56.5-23.5T120-200v-560q0-33 23.5-56.5T200-840h560q33 0 56.5 23.5T840-760v560q0 33-23.5 56.5T760-120H200Zm0-80h560v-560H200v560Zm40-80h480L570-480 450-320l-90-120-120 160Zm-40 80v-560 560Z&#x22;/></svg>" data-size="line">. Your message will be added and displayed on the **Activity** tab.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (983).png" alt="" width="563"><figcaption><p>Add message dialog</p></figcaption></figure>
